Description.Name: Only Four Bolts...
Description.Details: A sharp, metallic groan echoes through the Argo's hull, louder than any sound that should exist in the vacuum of space. Darius stiffens at his station, his eyes immediately darting to the warning lights on the console as the ship's alarms begin to wail — a siren of dread. “The Beta Pod Cargo bay!” Darius shouts, his voice tight as he turns toward you. Your face pales as you register the flashing alerts. Without warning, a violent decompression explosion erupts in the aft section of the ship. A massive rush of air and debris tears through the cargo bay as the pressure difference between the vessel's interior and the void outside becomes catastrophic. Metal screeches, crates hurtle into the darkness, and unsecured equipment is ripped free, smashing into anything in its path. The ship bucks, systems flickering, while the crew scrambles to brace for impact. You and Darius rush down towards the cargo bay to assess the damage. Containment bulkheads have shut off main access, and Yang is there directing the astech crews. You call out to Yang, "What's the damage, Yang?" Yang winces, "It's a bad one Boss. One of the cargo doors in Beta Pod, Twenty-Six Alpha, has failed. We won't know more until we get in to assess the situation." You nod, "Keep me posted Yang." An alert sounds on Darius' noteputer, "Commander, we have numerous injuries throughout the Argo and three of those are in critical condition. The MedTechs say they can only save two of them, but need you to specify who lives and who... doesn't." You stare at Darius for what seems like an eternity before his question pulls you out of your stupor, "Commander, the MedTechs need an answer." You rub your hands over your face and look at Darius, "Who's injured?" Darius consults his noteputer, "Three crew members were caught in the bay when the hatch failed. [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] was thrown into a bulkhead, knocked unconscious with serious head trauma. [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] was impaled by hydrospanner. And [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] was slammed into the deck, with multiple bones shattering under the force.

Description.Name: TRT_MW has died
Description.Details:
With a heavy heart, you sigh loudly as you survey the damage, "Darius, tell the MedTechs they are to do their utmost to save all three MechWarriors.  Give priority to [[TGT_MW,{TGT_MW.Callsign}]] and [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]."

Darius nods, "Yes, Commander."

Yang approaches, an angry look on his face, "Boss, we lost a few asTechs in that accident.  Four anchor bolts on the cargo door, improperly installed, appears to be the point of failure," he hisses.  "Totally Boeing Interstellar's fault and their damned shortcuts!"  

Your jaw tightens, "We need a full report on the damage,  Every bolt, every rivet checked!”  

The sad truth is this could have been avoided. Boeing Interstellar's negligence had nearly cost them their lives.

additionalValues: Killed by Boeing Interstellar's failure of 4 door bolts worth ¢107
